entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
